name: World of Shadowrun: A Primer
description:
If you aren't familiar with Shadowrun, or just want a quick refresher, here's a document Mike Mulvihill brought to us from the old days. It covers a little bit of everything, and should give you a good idea what the World of Shadowrun world is all about. Enjoy!

(Note that this document is several years old and was originally designed for internal use - in other words, it ain't proofread folks.)
notes: A semi-internal doc about the world of Shadowrun.
